Title: phoenix dragon pocket watch skeleton mechanical hand-wind copper and alloy case
Description: Carrie Hughes Phoenix Dragon Pocket Watch Skeleton Mechanical hand-wind Copper and alloy case CHPW36 item description About Products - Pocket watches under our private brand "Carrie Hughes" make superb birthday or Christmas gifts. - They are also ideal for corporate gifts or for anyone looking for cool things to buy. - Here is an example of a pocket watch in a vintage gothic design. - High quality Mechanical Hand-wind pocket watch.( The best gift to a family or friend） Technical specifications - Clasp Type: detachable key ring and clip - Product number: CHPW36 - Display: Analog - Movement: Mechanical Hand-wind - Case material: copper and Alloy - Case (Length/Width/Height): 47 / 47 / 15 mm - Band Material：Metal Chain - Band width：5 mm - Band (Length/Width): 370 / 5 mm - Calendar function: no - Water-Resistance (bar/ATM): no Package included: Mechanical Pocket watch with chain * 1 - Carrie Hughes Brand Gift box * 1. How use mechanical watch? - 1.When you first wear, turn the pocket watch button (clockwise) until it is full (15-18 hands). - 2. Gently pull up the button, turn the adjustment time, and then press the button. - 3. If you are still standing for a long time, please gently swing several times, winding a few laps. At this point it will work properly. - 4. If you feel the winding is tight, please immediately stop spinning, so as not to damage the movement.
